md.name: descriptive
md.value: <record xmlns="http://www.loc.gov/MARC21/slim" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.loc.gov/MARC21/slim http://www.loc.gov/standards/marcxml/schema/MARC21slim.xsd"><leader>02582ntm^a22003497a^4500</leader><controlfield tag="FMT">BK</controlfield><controlfield tag="001">fsv320903</controlfield><controlfield tag="003">CZ PrCU</controlfield><controlfield tag="005">20090102122434.0</controlfield><controlfield tag="008">031008s2003^^^^xr^|||||^|||||^|||||slo|d</controlfield><datafield tag="040" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">ABD103</subfield><subfield code="b">cze</subfield><subfield code="c">ABD103</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="100" ind1="1" ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Jánošíková, Katarína,</subfield><subfield code="d">1982-</subfield><subfield code="4">dis</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="245" ind1="1" ind2="0"><subfield code="a">Zahraničné investície a corporate governance</subfield><subfield code="h">[rukopis] :</subfield><subfield code="b">prípadová štúdia podniku Východoslovenské železiarne, a.s. /</subfield><subfield code="c">Katarína Jánošíková ; konzultant Karel Kouba</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="246" ind1="3" ind2="3"><subfield code="a">Foreign investments and corporate governance :</subfield><subfield code="b">the case study of Východoslovenské železiarne, a.s.</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="260" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Praha,</subfield><subfield code="c">2003</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="300" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">82 listů :</subfield><subfield code="b">tab.</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="500" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Prameny a literatura na s. 78-81</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="502" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Bakalářská práce (Bc.)--Univerzita Karlova. Fakulta sociálních věd. Institut ekonomických studií, 2003</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="520" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Práca sa zaoberá mechanizmami corporate governance v podniku počas ekonomickej transformácie na Slovensku. Cieľom práce je prostredníctvom analytického rámca a prípadovej štúdie podniku Východoslovenské železiarne, a.s. popísať vývoj a fungovanie inštitúcií corporate governance na úrovni podniku a analyzovať vplyv zahraničných investícií na corporate governance. Rozdielny vývoj popisovaného podniku v dvoch obdobiach, spojený s prítomnosťou dvoch rôznych typov zahraničnej investície, vytvoril priestor pre porovnávanie jednotlivých aspektov corporate governance a analýzu pôsobenia zahraničných investícií na ne.</subfield><subfield code="9">slo</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="520" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">The paper is dealing with corporate governance mechanisms in a company during the period of economic transformation in the Slovak republic. The aim of the paper is by means of the analytical framework and the case study of the company Východoslovenské železiarne, a.s. to describe the development and functioning of the corporate governance institutions at the company level and to analyse the influence of foreign investments on corporate governance. Different development of the company in two consecutive periods afforded opportunity for a comparison of particular aspects of corporate governance and an analysis of impact of foreign investments on these aspects.</subfield><subfield code="9">eng</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="650" ind1="0" ind2="7"><subfield code="a">Ekonomika slovenská</subfield><subfield code="2">fsv</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="650" ind1="0" ind2="7"><subfield code="a">Investice zahraniční</subfield><subfield code="2">fsv</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="650" ind1="0" ind2="7"><subfield code="a">Práce bakalářské</subfield><subfield code="2">fsv</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="650" ind1="0" ind2="7"><subfield code="a">Privatizace</subfield><subfield code="2">fsv</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="650" ind1="0" ind2="7"><subfield code="a">Studie případová</subfield><subfield code="2">fsv</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="653" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Bakalářská práce</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="655" ind1=" " ind2="4"><subfield code="a">bakalářské práce</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="700" ind1="1" ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Kouba, Karel,</subfield><subfield code="d">1927-</subfield><subfield code="7">jk01062240</subfield><subfield code="4">oth</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="710" ind1="2" ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Univerzita Karlova.</subfield><subfield code="b">Institut ekonomických studií</subfield><subfield code="7">xx0005480</subfield><subfield code="4">dgg</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="980" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">application.pdf</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="981" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">bc</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="910" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">ABD103</subfield></datafield><controlfield tag="998">000320903</controlfield><datafield tag="SID" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Z39</subfield><subfield code="b">CKS01</subfield></datafield></record>
